scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix client" "npm run dev-windows --prefix server"
scripts.deploy-windows: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server && npm run deploy-windows --prefix server
scripts.deploy-linux: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server && npm run deploy-linux --prefix server
scripts.install: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.cd: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"
